an5.57:1.1: “Pancimani, bhikkhave, thanani abhinham paccavekkhitabbani itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:1.3: ‘Jaradhammomhi, jaram anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:1.4: ‘Byadhidhammomhi, byadhim anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:1.5: ‘Maranadhammomhi, maranam anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:1.6: ‘Sabbehi me piyehi manapehi nanabhavo vinabhavo’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:1.8: Yam kammam karissami—kalyanam va papakam va—
an5.57:1.9: tassa dayado bhavissami’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:2.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘jaradhammomhi, jaram anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va?
an5.57:2.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, sattanam yobbane yobbanamado, yena madena matta kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti.
an5.57:2.3: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso va pahiyati tanu va pana hoti.
an5.57:2.4: Idam kho, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘jaradhammomhi, jaram anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:3.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘byadhidhammomhi, byadhim anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va?
an5.57:3.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, sattanam arogye arogyamado, yena madena matta kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti.
an5.57:3.3: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato yo arogye arogyamado so sabbaso va pahiyati tanu va pana hoti.
an5.57:3.4: Idam kho, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘byadhidhammomhi, byadhim anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:4.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘maranadhammomhi, maranam anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va?
an5.57:4.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, sattanam jivite jivitamado, yena madena matta kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti.
an5.57:4.3: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato yo jivite jivitamado so sabbaso va pahiyati tanu va pana hoti.
an5.57:4.4: Idam kho, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘maranadhammomhi, maranam anatito’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:5.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘sabbehi me piyehi manapehi nanabhavo vinabhavo’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va?
an5.57:5.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, sattanam piyesu manapesu yo chandarago yena ragena ratta kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti.
an5.57:5.3: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato yo piyesu manapesu chandarago so sabbaso va pahiyati tanu va pana hoti.
an5.57:5.4: Idam kho, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘sabbehi me piyehi manapehi nanabhavo vinabhavo’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:6.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘kammassakomhi, kammadayado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapatisarano, yam kammam karissami—
an5.57:6.2: kalyanam va papakam va—tassa dayado bhavissami’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va?
an5.57:6.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, sattanam kayaduccaritam vaciduccaritam manoduccaritam.
an5.57:6.4: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato sabbaso va duccaritam pahiyati tanu va pana hoti.
an5.57:6.5: Idam kho, bhikkhave, atthavasam paticca ‘kammassakomhi, kammadayado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapatisarano, yam kammam karissami—
an5.57:6.7: tassa dayado bhavissami’ti abhinham paccavekkhitabbam itthiya va purisena va gahatthena va pabbajitena va.
an5.57:7.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, ariyasavako iti patisancikkhati:
an5.57:7.2: ‘na kho ahanneveko jaradhammo jaram anatito, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbe satta jaradhamma jaram anatita’ti.
an5.57:7.3: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato maggo sanjayati.
an5.57:7.4: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an5.57:7.5: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani sabbaso pahiyanti anusaya byantihonti.
an5.57:8.1: ‘Na kho ahanneveko byadhidhammo byadhim anatito, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbe satta byadhidhamma byadhim anatita’ti.
an5.57:8.2: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato maggo sanjayati.
an5.57:8.3: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an5.57:8.4: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani sabbaso pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
an5.57:9.1: ‘Na kho ahanneveko maranadhammo maranam anatito, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbe satta maranadhamma maranam anatita’ti.
an5.57:9.2: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato maggo sanjayati.
an5.57:9.3: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an5.57:9.4: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani sabbaso pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
an5.57:10.1: ‘Na kho mayhevekassa sabbehi piyehi manapehi nanabhavo vinabhavo, atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbesam sattanam piyehi manapehi nanabhavo vinabhavo’ti.
an5.57:10.2: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato maggo sanjayati.
an5.57:10.3: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an5.57:10.4: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani sabbaso pahiyanti, anusaya byantihonti.
an5.57:11.1: ‘Na kho ahanneveko kammassako kammadayado kammayoni kammabandhu kammapatisarano, yam kammam karissami—kalyanam va papakam va—tassa dayado bhavissami;
an5.57:11.2: atha kho yavata sattanam agati gati cuti upapatti sabbe satta kammassaka kammadayada kammayoni kammabandhu kammapatisarana, yam kammam karissanti—kalyanam va papakam va—tassa dayada bhavissanti’ti.
an5.57:11.3: Tassa tam thanam abhinham paccavekkhato maggo sanjayati.
an5.57:11.4: So tam maggam asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
an5.57:11.5: Tassa tam maggam asevato bhavayato bahulikaroto samyojanani sabbaso pahiyanti, anusaya byantihontiti.
